name: aria Coordination Tasks
description: Active coordination tasks managed by aria

assignedTasks.taskDescription: Review the new UI mockup document (sselfie-studio-ui-mockup.md) and evaluate implementation feasibility for the website builder component. Focus on the BUILD Zone section and how it integrates with your existing website creation capabilities.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Urgent: Implement AWS S3 bucket configuration and initial setup for SSELFIE STUDIO admin image storage. Requirements:
1. Create S3 bucket with appropriate security policies
2. Set up IAM roles and permissions
3. Configure CORS and bucket policies
4. Implement initial connection testing
5. Provide configuration details for integration
assignedTasks.workflowContext: This is part of the critical image storage infrastructure implementation for SSELFIE STUDIO. We need a secure, scalable solution for storing admin account images with proper backup and recovery systems.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:

assignedTasks.workflowContext: Creating comprehensive testing suite for SSELFIE STUDIO's image storage system. This is critical for ensuring reliable image handling for our luxury editorial platform.
